name: Sun Eater (Sappir)
description:
You move towards glowing balls of light and take their heat. Enemies guard them, take them out and grow young sun eater!

WASD for movement

Mouse and Left click to aim and shoot.

The bullet effect and explosion comes from AllInFX from the unity store

Background comes from DinVStudio. You can find them on Itch.io

Sounds come from Ultimate music bundle and fx from the unity store.

Everything else is from me.
